alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 2:43PM CST until January 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...SNOW AND BLOWING SNOW CONTINUES THIS AFTERNOON... .Low pressure passing over the northern Great Lakes will continue to produce wintry weather over northeast Wisconsin. Periods of snow generated by the system will persist through the end of the afternoon. In addition, gusty winds will result in patchy blowing and drifting snow across open areas. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Marathon, Portage and Wood Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
